text: This is an example that searches PDF files in the current directory.

code:
import os, os.path
import re

def print_pdf (arg, dir, files):
 for file in files:
  path = os.path.join(dir, file)
  path = os.path.normcase(path)
  if re.search(r".*\.pdf", path):
   print path

os.path.walk('.', print_pdf, 0)
